* list item 1

    ```
    <parent>
    <child>child1</child>
    <!-- This is a comment -->
    <child>child2</child>
    <child>some text <!-- a comment --></child>
    </parent>
    ```

* list item 2

```
<parent>

<!-- This is a comment -->
<child>child2</child>
<child>some text <!-- a comment --></child>
</parent>
```
